meaning_str.bing:
n. 一月
网络. 一月份；元月；一月一日

1.en: In January American manufacturers saw their revenues grow faster than those of any other sector.
1.cn: 1月份美国制造业利润增长速度快于任何其他部门。

2.en: The coroner's report is expected by early January and with it, a ruling on whether the financier committed suicide.
2.cn: 预计验尸报告将于1月初之前公布，同时公布的还有彭日成是否死于自杀的裁决。

3.en: Daniel Tammet is author of two books, Born on a Blue Day and Embracing the Wide Sky, the latter of which came out in January.
3.cn: 丹尼尔.塔曼特是《诞生于忧郁日子》和《拥抱广阔天空》这两本书的作者，后者是一月才出版的。

0.en: And they didn't even cut me in on the Lifetime Movie rights. It's on in January, Father Is the Bride.
0.cn: 把故事版权卖给生活电影台时，钱也没分我，一月份就上映了，片名是《新娘是岳父》。

1.en: Chinese New Year, also known as Lunar New Year, is celebrated throughout the world in late January or early February.
1.cn: 中国新年，又被称作农历新年，世界各地都在一月下旬或者二月上旬庆祝这个节日。

2.en: And so, Thanksgiving, Christmas, and half of January have come and gone, and all three branches of government are in crisis.
2.cn: 就这样，感恩节，圣诞节，再加上半个一月来了又去，政府的三大分支全都深陷危机。

3.en: And if you're gonna do Minsk, that's the way to go. So when do you leave? January 1 st.
3.cn: 如果你们去明斯克就是这样去的。你们何时去明斯克？1月1日。

4.en: In Britain, on January the 1st, New Year's day, what is the first thing everyone wants to do once they have finally woken up?
4.cn: 在英国，新年第一天1月1日，当大家从梦中醒来的时候，每个人会做的第一件事情是什么？

5.en: When the President and I took office in January of 2009, this nation was in the midst of the greatest economic crisis since the great depression.
5.cn: 2009年1月，在总统和我主政之初，全国正深陷自大萧条以来最严重的经济危机之中。

6.en: In China, the New Year can start from like, the middle of January than to the end of February. And this lunar cycle repeats itself every 12 years.
6.cn: 中国的春节那天会在是1月中旬到2月底其间的一天。这种农历的循环每12年重复一次。

7.en: Then, when the new Congress convenes in January, we need to work together to invest in the things that support faster growth in higher-paying jobs.
7.cn: 然后，当新一届国会在1月份召集起来后，我们要团结合作，进行投资以便支持更高工资的就业岗位和更快的经济增长。

8.en: But all the flights you piloted before January 15th and every crash you investigated are not the purview of this investigation. Only US Airways 1549 matters today.
8.cn: 1月15号前，你飞过的所有航班之前你调查过的任何事故，都与这起调查无关，今天我们只关心全美航空1549。

9.en: And in January, more than 100 college presidents and nonprofit leaders came to the White House and made commitments to increase opportunities for underserved students.
9.cn: 今年1月，100多名大学校长、非营利机构的负责人齐聚白宫，共同承诺要为缺少关怀的学生提供更多机遇。
